title: Command Injection in Ping Utility
description: The ping utility at /ping.php is vulnerable to command injection attacks. User input is directly passed to the system command without proper sanitization.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/ping.php
2. Enter 127.0.0.1; whoami in the IP address field
3. Click Ping
4. The system will execute both the ping command and the whoami command
5. The output will show both ping results and the current user
